project.name: Cult of Joey — Dark Neon Cyberpunk Personal Brand Site
project.description: A dark-neon cyberpunk personal brand hub blending queer rave culture, mental-health storytelling, technical homelab/IT energy, and creative workshops (cosplay, tattoos, DIY, tech).

pillars: Raw + honest: mental health, lived experience, queer identity, scars and recovery.
Technical: homelab/IT/coding presence should be visible in UI and content.
Occult-but-playful: ritual, sigils, neon mysticism, ‘cult’ as community and ritual, not horror-gore.

primary: queer community and queer alt/kink-adjacent audiences
people interested in mental health and lived experience storytelling
creative DIY makers: cosplay, tattoos, crafting, photography, art
fans of cyberpunk, neon, occult-adjacent aesthetics
Build a strong, recognizable personal brand.

wireframes.home: Create a full-page wireframe for a dark-neon cyberpunk personal brand site. Section 1 — Hero: full-width gradient #05040A → #151027, left: giant Orbitron title, subtitle, primary CTA; right: 'Now Broadcasting' card showing latest post/project. Section 2 — Journal Strip: 3-card grid showing latest entries with mood chips and excerpts. Section 3 — Workshop Showcase: 2 featured project cards with full-bleed images and spec chips. Section 4 — Gallery Band: 6-image strip with hover zoom and gradient overlays. Section 5 — Footer: minimal links, neon-accent divider, peer-support note.
wireframes.book_of_joey: Create a blog index wireframe. Section 1 — Intro: short paragraph describing the journal. Section 2 — Filter Chips: mood/era filter chips in pill style. Section 3 — Masonry Grid: 3-column responsive masonry for posts (card layout with title/mood/excerpt).
wireframes.single_post: Create a single post template wireframe. Section 1 — Header: Orbitron title, mood chip, date, reading time. Section 2 — Article: narrow reading container using Space Grotesk. Section 3 — Pull Quotes: glow-bordered callouts. Section 4 — Related Posts: 3 related posts titled 'More from this Era'.
wireframes.workshop_index: Create a workshop index wireframe. Section 1 — Category Filters: Cosplay, Tech, Tattoo, DIY chips. Section 2 — 3-Column Grid: cards with image, title, summary, and spec chips.
wireframes.gallery: Create a filterable gallery wireframe. Section 1 — Filters: Photography, Art, Events, Self. Section 2 — Image Grid: masonry or justified gallery with lightbox.
wireframes.rv_life: Create a timeline page wireframe. Section 1 — Intro text. Section 2 — Timeline: alternating left/right entries with date, title, description, and image. Section 3 — Optional Map Band: simple map embed with neon border.
wireframes.summon_me: Create a contact page wireframe. Section 1 — Heading: large neon Orbitron title. Section 2 — Two-Column Form: name, email, message, checkboxes. Section 3 — Disclaimer: external safety disclaimer with link.

sections.hero: Create a full-width hero section in a dark-neon cyberpunk style. Background: gradient #05040A → #151027 with soft magenta and cyan glow accents. Left column: large Orbitron title with neon magenta glow, subtitle in Space Grotesk. Primary CTA button: magenta pill, cyan hover glow. Right column: card titled 'Now Broadcasting' showing a featured post or project with neon border and soft glow. Add subtle glitch accent on the hero title. Spacing: generous, cinematic.
sections.journal_strip: Create a 3-card grid showcasing journal entries. Each card: dark surface background (#0E0B1A), thin violet border, soft neon glow on hover. Include: title (Oxanium), mood chip (teal/magenta/indigo/orange), short excerpt, and 'Read →' link. Cards lift slightly on hover with cyan glow. Spacing should be airy and readable.
sections.workshop_strip: Build a 2-card row for workshop projects. Each card: full-bleed image with gradient overlay (magenta→cyan), title in Orbitron, small spec chips (e.g., Docker · Traefik · EVA Foam). Hover interaction: slight zoom + neon glow. Include a 'View Details' button in cyan outline with neon hover.
sections.gallery_strip: Create a full-width gallery strip with 6 images in a responsive grid. Use dark background, neon-hover zoom, gradient overlay on hover with title text. Enable lightbox. Keep it highly visual and minimal text.
sections.blog_index: Create a blog index layout with intro paragraph at top, mood/era filter chips (pills with glow), and a masonry grid of posts (3 columns desktop). Post cards include: mood chip, title, excerpt, neon hover glow. Use Space Grotesk for body, Oxanium for headings.
sections.single_post: Build a single-post layout: narrow content width, Orbitron neon-glow title, mood chip + date + reading time, Space Grotesk body text, glow-border pull quotes, code blocks in dark neon theme, and a 'More from this Era' section at bottom with 3 related posts.
sections.workshop_index: Create a workshop index with category filter chips and a 3-column grid of workshop cards. Each card includes image, title, short summary, and spec chips. Add neon hover glow and card lift effect.
sections.rv_life: Build a timeline layout with alternating left-right entries. Each entry includes date, title, description, and small image. Background: dark violet with neon dividers. Add optional map band with cyan glow border.
sections.summon_me: Create a bold neon contact section with large Orbitron heading, two-column form (name/email/message + checkboxes), neon-accent focus rings, cyan outline button with magenta glow on hover, and a safety disclaimer below linking externally.

header_footer.header: Create a sticky translucent header with blurred background. Left: site title in Orbitron. Right: nav menu with neon underline hover (cyan). Active link glows magenta. Add a subtle bottom neon divider line.
header_footer.footer: Create a minimalist neon footer. Left: small logo/title. Center: inline links. Right: social icons (Mastodon, GitHub). Add a faint neon top divider glow.

global_styles.colors: Create a global color system with: Background #05040A, Surface #0E0B1A, Surface Alt #151027, Primary Magenta #E600FF, Primary Soft #FF7BFF, Accent Cyan #00FFFF, Accent Soft #66FFFF, Text #F5F5FA, Muted Text #9B92BB, Border #2B2540, Glow #7D3CFF.
global_styles.typography: Set global typography: Headings in Oxanium (bold, neon magenta accent), Display/Hero in Orbitron (large fluid size), Body in Space Grotesk (comfortable line-height), and Mono in JetBrains Mono for code or UI elements.
global_styles.buttons: Create button system: Primary magenta pill with cyan glow hover, secondary transparent with cyan outline, ghost with underline from center on hover. Use cyberpunk easing (0.18,0.89,0.32,1.28).
global_styles.containers: Set container widths: narrow 680px, standard 960px, wide 1180px. Use 12-column grid on desktop, 6-column on tablet, single-column on mobile.
global_styles.motion: Use neon cyberpunk motion: hover glows (200–260ms), slight scale-up (1.02) on interactive elements, underline animations for links, soft glitch effects for selected headings, and respect reduced-motion accessibility.

custom_css_snippets.glitch_text: selector { position: relative; } selector::before, selector::after { content: attr(data-text); position: absolute; left: 0; top: 0; opacity: 0.7; } selector::before { color: #E600FF; transform: translate(2px, -2px); } selector::after { color: #00FFFF; transform: translate(-2px, 2px); }
custom_css_snippets.underline_animation: selector { position: relative; } selector::after { content: ''; position: absolute; bottom: 0; left: 50%; width: 0%; height: 2px; background: #00FFFF; transition: 0.3s ease; } selector:hover::after { left: 0; width: 100%; }
